amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Advanced Research Projects Agency - Energy (ARPA-E) account by $20 million and reduces funding for DOE's Departmental Administration account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Advanced Research Projects Agency - Energy (ARPA-E) account by $20 million and reduce funds for the Departmental Administration account of the Department of Energy by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A032) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 205 (Roll no. 383).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A032) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 205 (Roll no. 383).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Schiff.
